lead_paragraph: Islamic State extremists will keep trying attacks on so-called soft targets in Europe as the group increasingly goes global.
snippet: Islamic State extremists will keep trying attacks on so-called soft targets in Europe as the group increasingly goes global.

headline.main: Police Agency Warns of More Terrorist Attacks
headline.print_headline: Europe; Police Agency Warns of More Attacks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

abstract: Europol agency releases report warning that Islamic State extremists will continue to conduct terrorist attacks on so-called soft targets in Europe.
